entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who has a wand that is connected to Voldemort's wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, whose wand core is connected to Harry's wand.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: A wizard who explains the connection between Harry's and Voldemort's wands.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: A journalist who is mentioned as being excited about the connection between Harry's and Voldemort's wands.

entities.name: harry's wand
entities.description: Harry's wand, which has a phoenix feather core that is connected to Voldemort's wand.

entities.name: voldemort's wand
entities.description: Voldemort's wand, whose core is connected to Harry's wand.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who he is related to.

entities.name: phoenix feather
entities.description: A component of Harry's wand that is connected to Voldemort's wand.

entities.name: quick-quotes quill
entities.description: Rita Skeeter's tool for taking notes.

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort share a phoenix feather in their wands.
Harry interacts with Mr. Ollivander, who explains the connection between Harry's and Voldemort's wands.
